title: abas firefox borwser
content: Oi. Alguém pode me ensinar como faço para visualizar abas ja abertas sem ter que clicar, só apontando o mouse para elas? Eu tinha no pc no firefox mas desapareceu. Agradeço
creator: lujackman

title: Yahoo Mail & YouTube
content:
I can not use Yahoo Mail at all. All links to commands are dead since 97 update.

YouTube has been full of glitches for over 3 months. Playlists crash. Dead links like in Yahoo mail. Can not search channels with keywords. All these issues are limited to Firefox. Chrome works fine but my data didn't properly import from Firefox so logins and bookmarks are a pain because on nonexistence in Chrome. Having to look up login and passwords in one browser to use in another is a major waste of time.

My business is being damaged by the lack of ability to send or receive communications, especially attachments. I have been unable to order from vendors that I normally send files to for production.

Please help!
creator: speedmaverick

title: Please add the COLLECTIONS feature from the mobile app into the desktop browser
content:
I am requesting that the "collections" feature be added to the desktop browser and that it be synced along with everything else when you have a Firefox account.

THANK YOU,

Jake
creator: jake.porto

title: RELIABILITY and QUALITY CONTROL.
content: I'm one of the earliest adopters of Firefox and a Mozilla supporter for many years - but it seems the current crew does not grasp the concept of Testing and Quality Control.
creator: BillMayhew

title: RECENT RELEASES OF FIREFOX HAVE MORE BUGS THAN IMPROVEMENTS.
content: IMPLEMENT AND ENFORCE SOFTWARE QUALITY CONTROL STANDARDS. RECENT RELEASES (LAST SIX MONTHS) SEEM TO HAVE MORE DEFECTS THAN IMPROVEMENTS.
creator: BillMayhew

title: Secure Websites needing Update when Browser is already up to date
content: I have now had two websites that are having problems with a fully updated Firefox and they are telling me to update the Browser. Chase and now the IRS site is wanting me to update and I'm running 97.0.1 (64 bit). Win10 that is also fully updated.
creator: royparrish01

title: Can't delete all cookies on restart
content:
I cannot remove all cookies on shutdown. I wish to ignore white list, or any other limitation, and automatically remove ALL cookies so that, on my next start-up, there is NO memory space taken up with cookies.

If necessary, I will be pleased to have all whitelist contents deleted on each shut-down.

I do want to keep browse history and have past windows open automatically. This question is only about cookies.

I have set up the HISTORY section of Setup to delete all cookies, but no joy.

I am running Firefox 97.0(64-bit) on Ubuntu-Mate 20.04.

Please tell me how I can do this automatically.
creator: firefox1715
